metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32610 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Archive_Tar before 1.4.14, symlinks can refer to targets outside of the extracted archive, a different vulnerability than CVE-2020-36193.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32610` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-pear - 1:1.10.5+submodules+notgz-1ubuntu1.18.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-pear package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.10.5+submodules+notgz-1ubuntu1.18.04.4').
